question:
No    Plural
Meaning
1.
Bottle
2.
Sheep
3.
Cup
4.
Plate
5
Bowl
6
Liter
7.
Book
8.
Box
9.
Baby
10
Potato
11.
Dog
12.
Toy
13
Table
14.
Window
15.
Door
16.
Leaf
17.
Bus
18.
Watch
19.
Wife
20.
Woman​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Plural form

1. Bottle - Bottles

2. Sheep - Sheep

3. Cup - Cups

4. Plate - Plates

5. Bowl - Bowls

6. Liter - Liters

7. Book - Books

8. Box - Boxes

9. Baby - Babies

10. Potato - Potatoes

11. Dog - Dogs

12. Toy - Toys

13. Table - Tables

14. Window - Windows

15. Door - Doors

16. Leaf - Leaves

17. Bus - Buses

18. Watch - Watches

19. Wife - Wives

20. Woman - Women

Penjelasan:

Plural form adalah bentuk kata benda yang mempunyai jumlah lebih dari satu atau banyak. misalnya :

satu buku - dua buku = one book - two books

penambahan akhiran dengan huruf s atau es, contohnya : flower-flowers,box-boxes

ada beberapa yang berubah kata atau malah tetap, contohnya : Man-Men,Child-Children,Mouse-Mice

leaf-leaves, wife-wives,

hope you find this helpful ^•^

related_questions.question:
1.    Complete the dialog by correcting the words in the brackets.
Diyan : (1/ want/go/ Daly city)
(the bus/ go / Daly city)?
Hayu : No, it doesn't.
Diyan : Where does it go?
Hayu : (it/go/ downtown).
Diyan: How do I get to Daly City?
Hayu
(cross / the street) and (wait / the next Number 14).
Source: http://squirrelspace.blogspot.co.id
2.
a.
Choose the correct time expression used with the present continuous tense.
What are you doing (tomorrow / yesterday) afternoon?
b. (Currently / Current) we're working on the Anderson account.
What are you doing (this/next) afternoon?
d. Thomas is presenting at the meeting (on / in) April.
Change the word in the brackets into past tense form.
C.
3.
1 (wake) up around 8:30 a.m. in the morning yesterday. When I (look) at the
clock 1 (say), "Oh, I'm getting late for the Yoga class and my teacher is going to
punish me for this." It (be not) the first time for me to be late for the class.

TOLONG DIBANTU YA KAK NO 1.2.3​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Dyan : I want to go to Daly city.

Does the bus go to Daly city?

Hayu : No, It doesn't.

Dyan : Where does it go?

Hayu : It goes downtown.

Dyan : How do i get to Daly city?

Hayu : Go cross the street and wait the next bus number 14.

2. a. Tomorrow

b. Currently

c. This

d. In

3. woke,looked,said,was not,

Penjelasan:

hope you find this helpful^•^

related_questions.question: The shop...late yesterday a. closed B. close C closes d. closing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. closed

Penjelasan:

Kenapa yang closed? Karena disitu udah ada kata yesterday yang dimana artinya kemarin sehingga harus menggunakan Past Tense yang dimana past tense ini verbnya (kata kerja) menggunakan bentuk kedua.

related_questions.question: Bu Sri meminjam uang dikoperasi sebesar Rp.6.000.000 dengan bunga 18% setahun jika lamah meminjam 12 bulan .maka berapakah total pinjaman yang harus bu sri bayar kepada koperasi ?pakai jalan y plis ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

bunga selama setahun atau 12 bulan =

18 x Rp. 6.000.000 = Rp. 1.080.000

pinjaman + bunga = Rp. 6.000.000 + Rp. 1.080.000 = Rp. 7.080.000

Total pinjaman yang harus di bayar ibu Sri adalah Rp. 7.080.000

Penjelasan:

bunga selama setahun atau 12 bulan =

18 x Rp. 6.000.000 = Rp. 1.080.000

pinjaman + bunga = Rp. 6.000.000 + Rp. 1.080.000 = Rp. 7.080.000

Total pinjaman yang harus di bayar ibu Sri adalah Rp. 7.080.000

semoga membantu^•^

related_questions.question:
Change these sentences into simple past tense.    a. All the

students in this school clean all the part of their school to face the Independence day.

b. Our

headmaster gives punishment to the students who don't wear uniform.


Bantu jawab kak. jgn ngasal ya kakk​

answers.answer:
All the students in this school cleaned all the part of their school to face the independence day

Our headmaster gave punishment to the students who did not wear uniform

a. All the students cleaned all the part of their school to faced the independence day.

b. Our headmaster gave punishment to the students who didn't wear uniform.

related_questions.question: Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a....daydesi:yes. lets play outdoor

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a sunny day

Desi: yes. lets play outdoor!

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan merupakan kata sifat (Adjective) yaitu sunny yang berarti cerah dan berfungsi untuk menjelaskan kata benda (Noun) day. Karena hari cerah, maka Desi mengajak untuk bermain di luar.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
My mom buys some oranges.... are very    sour.the appropriate pronun is....
A.it B.they C.we D.he​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

They

Penjelasan:

Oranges are plural therefore you use the pronoun 'they'

related_questions.question:
34. A. go B. went C. going D. gone    35. A. stay B. stays C. staying D. stayed

36. A. enjoy B. enjoyed C. enjoying D. enjoys

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

34. B. Went

35. D. Stayed

36. B. Enjoyed

Penjelasan: Simple Past Tense menggunakan kata kerja bentuk ke dua atau Verb 2

go-went

stay-stayed

enjoy-enjoyed

hope you find this helpful^•^

Jawaban:

34.went

35stayed

36enjoyed

Penjelasan:

semua dlm bentuk simple past tense krn sdh lampau
